page.title: 12EDUCATION PRE SCHOOL
page.content: KNIGHTON PLAYGROUP Knighton Playgroup began 16 years ago.It is held in the Youth Wing each week-day except Friday.There are about 25 children and 5 helpers in each two and a quarter hour session.Children from 1-4 years can attend.They play, sing,learn rhymes,paint,make feet- prints,bake bread and jam tarts, make models,have walks and swimming.At Christmas time Santa comes with presents.In Spring they visit a farm to see new born lambs,and in the Summer they have a teddy-bears picnic. At Playgroup they have a trampoline, slide,climbing frame,rocking horse, see-saw,tunnel,playkitchen,Lego,prams, tricycles and other wheeled toys, puzzles and books.Money is raised from jumble sales,bingo and sponsored walks.The children all love playgroup.
